name: The Final Trip
overview: The Final Trip is a two dimensional vertically scrolling shooter set in space. The player controls a space ship called the Eagle P5 and has to destroy various kinds of enemies. The works similarly to other scrolling shoot 'em ups, such as Vader, but the player here can move up and down and not just left and right. The player has only one life and the game ends upon the destruction of the ship although it can take some hits before that happen. The game is for one or two players and can be controlled with either joystick or mouse.
